name: LOMATBackup2022.exe
description:
The Land of Mist of Trails has been abandoned by its Player.   No one Guides the Lost Souls of the land to their final rest.

Can a mere robotic Butler serve as a substitute? 

You think so.

Use the power of Void to find hidden locations and challenge the Titan Fenrir for ownership of the Lost Souls. 

Beware: To best serve Void is to lose all Relevance. 

Perhaps inside the next Layer you may be seen again.
